Description: Develop, execute and manage project plan and delivery to ensure project completion in accordance with time, cost and quality objectives. Coordinate site to ensure smooth functioning of all departments; Ensure compliance with Quality and HSE requirements; Lead the project organizational unit throughout the project duration and be the focal point between client and QPM teamSkills
Skills: BSc/BEng in Civil or Architecture engineering; Chartered Engineer from recognized professional body is preferable.
Holding PMP certification or similar training certification.
Minimum of 15 years overall postgraduate experience with the last 6 years as a project manager with the following:
Ability to identify potential problems and be able to successfully and productively resolve problems or propose solutions.
Ability to demonstrate time management skills, and alignments of projects objectives.
Sound knowledge of Works Programme build up, components, critical path review & analysis.
Team building, ability to motivate and to work well within large team and show leadership skills.
Having worked in reputable projects during the Construction phase to completion
Ability to elicit cooperation from senior management and other project management's team members.
